goal: Swap Cabbage for Zapdos at the PC

updates.title: Trying to deposit Cabbage here, and bring out Zapdos
PC approach imminent! Hold me~
We are now in the Poke Center.
We have been defeated! We are whisked to the Pokemon Center outside Rock Tunnel.
We are now back in the Power Plant! Suicide time!
Twitch Chat is now deciding between Surf or going back to the Power Plant to suicide.
Looks like we're going the long way!
Drowzee defeats Lickitung with Confusion! Now for the surf back to the Pokemon Center.
Twitch Chat is actually hoping for a loss here, as swimming back to the Poke Center will be immensly difficult!
The false idol SS Ticket is consulting in this worrying time for Red.
Lickitung disables The Keeper's confusion.
Apparently Lickitung is enjoying this. Defense curling in response to Drowzee's pounds and headbutt.
Drowzee takes out Rhyhorn! But he's left to face a Lickitung.
ATV is down too. Only The Keeper remains. We could be in for a quick return to the pokemon center.
Red does not fancy the Keeper as ready. Back to ATV.
The Keeper is out against Rhyhorn, can he use the actually effective confusion? Or will he pound the rock?
Venomoth manages to slow down the rampaging Rhyhorn with a stun spore. Can the Keeper now take it out?
Video of Zapdos battle
We only have Bird Jesus, ATV, and Drowzee left.
ATV attempts a stun spore but (luckily?) misses. Unfortunately it looks like he's going to take a few hits!
Rhyhorn is now paralyzed!
Out comes All Terrain Venomoth! Can he die successfully and feed our impatience?
If we do die, we are able to respawn at the Poke Center immediately.
Nope! He clutches at 9HP! Before.. yep! He's down!
Out comes Dux and takes a storng horn attack and a literal stomping. His cuts and horn attacks barely scratch the enemy rhyhorn. Looks like he can only take one more hit!
Dux's cuts not doing uch against Rhyhorn's intimidating spikes.
With Bird Jesus at 8 hp, we switched to Dux to face PokeManiac's Rhyhorn!
A paralysed Jesus Bird comes out, and is fully paralysed! Uses worldwind and loses almost half the HP he has left! Uses whirlwind again! It's looking like a short trip back to the Center folks!
Glorious Suicide?
We have left the Power Plant victorious, with AA-j in tow.
More names from the chat: Aerial Jesus, Apple Jack, Anarchy Jesus, Aerial Justice....
Names are still being thrown in the air for Zapdos. Anarchy Jesus is also gaining popularity.
It's not over yet! We still have to operate the PC! Let's not have a repeat of the C3KO debacle!
Names suggestions pouring in on twitch chat. Alternative Jesus, Anarchy Jesus included.
Better check out Zapdos in the dex
ALTERNATIVE JESUS.
At this point, it's impossible to stay unemotional! Praise Dome!
Please exit the Power Factory to your left.
ZAPDOS has joined the party as 'AA-j'
YEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEES!
MASTER BALL THROWN.
We moved past the Master Ball in the list.
Past the great balls! There's a max potion in the way AND WE GOT PAST IT! MASTER BALL IS ONE SPACE UP!
We really must watch out for Great Balls! Throwing them could spell a chance of blacking out!

updates.description: We're back in the item menu, glancing through the Silph Scope on our way down.

updates.title: We got PAST the Pokéflute! That should be our biggest obstacle!
Hyper Potion used on ATV.
Apparently you can't fish a Zapdos with a Super Rod.
WE'RE DOWN TO THE SUPER ROD! WE'VE TRAVERSED ALMOST HALF OUR ITEM PACK!
We are in the item list, we consult the SS Ticket and Lift Key for throwing technique.
JUST AS LONG AS NOONE PRESSES RIGHT WE STAND A CHANCE. LEFTLEFTLEFTLEFT.
In comes Zapdos, level 50 as we all know. Bird Jesus is paralysed but.. WE OPEN THE ITEM MENU...
We are facing Zapdos
WILD ZAPDOS APPEARED!
We have engaged the Bird of Thunder, Zapdos.
OH GOD, OH GOD, OH GOD, OH GOD, OH GOD.
WE'RE IN THE ITEM LIST
WE ARE FACING ZAPDOS--NOW TO PRESS A
Approaching from the top right is dangerous stuff! Encourages the change of a run!
Bird Jesus hit with paralysis
Gotta smoke Pikachu before we deal with the bird
WE ARE ONE SPACE FROM ZAPDOS. WE JUST ALMOST SPOKE TO HIM. SWEET LORD ABOVE.
This is it everyone. Praise Helix and may he give us strength through the next few minutes.
We are now in the cubicle with Zapdos.
ZAPDOS IS ON SCREEN!.
Avoid pressing right at all costs once we near Zapdos.
Abba OHKO's a voltorb.

updates.description: Reminder, stay away from this door on the left in Zapdos' room, as it will boot us to the front of the Factory.

updates.title: It's almost embarassing how little damage the voltorbs' selfdestructs do to Bird Jesus.
WE ARE HERE.
Commentary
updates.description: It's almost embarassing how little damage the voltorbs' selfdestructs do to Bird Jesus.

updates.title: A wild voltorb used Self-Destruct! It did 10 damage to Bird Jesus.
C'mon guys, we're so close! We can do it!

updates.description: We are now showing the stream mode (democracy or anarchy) that each update was published in, as an icon next to each update.

updates.title: Commentary
updates.description: Oh sweet lord, we're almost at Zapdos. I'm so proud of you all.

updates.title: Some music to guide us through these final couple avenues
Lord Helix I love you but please keep us away from you and the item menu. I begeth thee
We're ~70% of the way there!

updates.description: It has just been pointed out that whirlwind could be used on zapdos. Gotta hit that item menu ladies and gents.

updates.title: Whirlwind and Running are two fearful possibilities. Please be careful.
Only a couple more mini chambers until we reach Zapdos. NO STOPPING THE RED TRAIN
We have Dux, Bird Jesus, The Keeper, and ATV left. All full health but Bird Jesus has taken hits to 129/190.
WE WERE SO CLOSE TO USING MASTER BALL on a wild Magnemite! We were one item above it, too scary holy--
As we venture closer and closer to Zapdos, please note to refrain from using right! Running is a very scary possibility.
We are here now! I'm getting nervous...
xCabbage has fainted to a voltorb-item self-destructing! AIR and xCabbage are now down!
We are currently here, ~40% in!
OH GOD WE ARE FIGHTING VOLTORB AND MENU IS UP and we got really low in the menu--getting towards Master Ball.":
We are facing an Electabuzz! First one to be seen in the Power Plant.
We are currently 1/4th way through the Power Plant! We are here.
Bird Jesus takes a quick attack from a pikachu. Answer? Rub some dirt in it with sand-attack and flee.
Red's dodging these fights like nobody's business.

updates.description: Bird Jesus now leads us into the fray against the electric army. Its powerful wings will ensure our escape.

updates.title: AIR has fainted to a wild Magneton!
Air flees from a spooky voltorb, only to be pulled back in by a Magneton.
We've escaped.
Oh no! Lapras is facing a voltorb and has 21 hp left. We couldn't escape.
Dux has defeated a Voltorb.
For AIR, Mist has replaced Growl!
MIST HAS REPLACD GROWL FOR AIR
Please note THIS MAP and note how some "items" are actually voltorbs!
xCabbage is Air Jordan's Pippen. Bouncing off each other to roll through the Power Factory.
AIR has defeated a Pikachu!
We're facing a Pikachu now! Cute.
xCabbage has defeated Magnemite!
[A] AIR Jordan is out first in a building full of Electric pokemon. This could be quite the electrifying experience for our dear cruise liner.
We are now facing Magnemite!
We ran from Magneton.
Into the Power Plant we go! We instantly encounter a wild Magneton.
We are facing our first pokemon in the Power Factory! Magneton.
We have entered the Power Factory! Here is a map
All this progress came a bit quickly for Red, so he had to take text speed down to medium.
We have landed onto the island for the Power Factory!
Hearing the music for surf is so refreshing.
SURF MODE, ENGAGE!
We have boarded AIR cruise lines. Please enjoy the ride.
Unfortunately, we cannot summon the S.S. Anne with our ticket to take us to the promised land.
We were able to successfully cut 5 times, yet are unable to surf once. Still attempting.
We almost surfed, but we were facing the land instead of the water :(
Bulbasaur offers advice on surfing. Too bad we can't understand it.
Please be careful not to drop the Master Ball while pressing start. :C
New live stream page
updates.description: Can you guys test this new page and offer your thoughts on Reddit?

updates.title: We are now facing the sea and are attempting to surf!
Bird Jesus has defeated a wild Spearow!
We defeated voltorb using AIR's strength.
Facing another voltorb after running from Spearow.
We just faced a voltrob before running, and now we are facing a Spearow. We are here in the grass!
Remember, we must surf towards the Power Planet. There is no direct route, here's where to surf.
We healed our pokemon.
Flirting with the Poke Center again.
Back outside. Keep the current objective in mind, we need to go North and then surf South to get to the Power Plant.
Another wild Pokemon fights us, we run. Still walking near the area surrounding the Rock Tunnel Poke Center, and in the grassy area above it.
We travel North of the Poke Center and encounter a wild Spearow. Air Jordan goes up, but we run away
Red escapes the Pokemon Center, at least for the moment.
Currently dancing around the PC. Is this some sort of ritual?
There seems to be a battle in the chat; one group wants to go to the PC and the other wants to keep going on the current objective. One of those has a huge chance of disaster.

updates.description: In order to reach the Power Plant, we need to go up to the grassy area above the Pokemon Center. We can surf on the right there. See map here

updates.title: And back into the Poke Center again.
Into the Poke Center we go. This might not end good. May Helix be with us in this time of trouble.
Pokemon Center by Rock Tunnel has been entered in order to heal pokemon. Helix stay our hand from the PC.
[RECAP] Just to catch everyone up, we have passed the trial of the ledge!
We are right on the edge of the Rock Tunnel entrance. However, we need to keep going south to get to the Power Plant
[A] It appears Red wanted a glance into Rock Tunnel. We need to surf to get to the Power Plant.
As we head eastward away from Route 9, we encounter a wild Spearow. We run away. Power station is getting closer and closer. We encounter another spearow, we run again
[A] We have made it past the ledge! Red is celebrating with some bird (Spearow) watching.
Wild pokemon battle on the north half of Route 9. We promptly run away
We got past the ledge! Amazing! Now let's see if we can fully get past the entire area.
Apparently there are streamers attempting to smite our savior Bird Jesus. Be strong, children of the helix.
After investigating a tree on the East outskirts of Cerulean City, we find ourselves right back where we started: The ledges. May Helix be with us.
[A] The voices push Red back into Route 9. Apparently he has a ledge to jump.
[A] Air Jordan promptly takes out Ekans. Anarchy is back in place.
Air Jordan is out and in action versus wild pokemon. Return to anarchy imminent.
[D] While heading westward away from Route 9, we encounter a wild Ekans. Air Jordan is sent in. Anarchy is slowly getting closer.
[D] Democracy appears to be taking us... Away from Route 9? Meanwhile, we slip closer to Anarchy
[D] With Democracy in action, can Red make progress? Or will Helix's calls for Start9's be obeyed?
Chat enacts Democracy to get past Route 9
We look to Bird Jesus for inspiration, and promptly attempt to fly... over the ledge.
Aaaaaand back down we go.
updates.description: After tasting freedom for a few minutes, we went back down below the ledge again. Back to the drawing board :(

updates.title: We beat the ledge!
updates.description: After a surprisingly short group effort in anarchy mode, we somehow made it past the ledge

updates.title: Crossing my fingers that this won't turn into a déjà vu of the last time we crossed paths with the ledges. Helix be with us. - the8bitremixguy
POLL: Stay on the ledge, go to the rock tunnel, or move on to other things?
updates.description: Let your voice be heard! What do you think Red should do?

updates.title: We have been trying to cross ledge for over 2 hours now but morale is still high! Keep an eye out, we'll be polling on whether we should take the ledge route or the tunnel route again soon!
Made it about a quarter of the way across the ledge! I believe that's today's record!
The votes have been tallied: we remain on the ledge!
updates.description: TEAMLEDGE wins at 62 percent! Let's keep at it!

updates.title: POLL TO DECIDE PATH
updates.description: Pick a path! Should we continue trying to make it across the ledge, or should we got through Lavender Town and the rock tunnel? You decide!

updates.title: SO CLOSE
Ledge path seems to be winning
POLL TO DECIDE PATH
updates.description: Pick a path! Should we continue trying to make it across the ledge, or should we got through Lavender Town and the rock tunnel? You decide!

updates.title: It has been suggested that we could work our way to Lavender Town then proceed up through Rock Tunnel again. A possibility if Lord Helix does not approve of our fraternizing with ledges.
Red attempting to break the world land speed record for not going anywhere
[UPDATE] For anyone just joining us, we are attempting to move East on Route 9 to reach the Power Plant. Ledges must be conquered.
we walked the entire lenght of the bottom
its like watching Red look for his glasses
not going anywhere fast
Red saved the game AGAIN!!
stuck under the ledge, Anarchy is still in charge
THE GAME HAS BEEN SAVED
Red takes a moment to almost save
so close to the ledge entry way
Red checks the SS Ticket for climbing advice
Took a couple steps onto the ledge, decided we weren't ready, and hopped off.
Red once again tries to conquer the ledge...
Red is spending a lot of time fiddling with his menus instead of ledging
Almost there! And then....
updates.description: A jump off

updates.title: Red checks pokedex again, attempts to save, and then heads right... under the ledge
Scroll down to the bottom to read older updates, for when you want a recap.
This comment is just to show we can make this as long as we really could ever want guys and seriously I can't imagine ever writing anything longer than this this is just ridiculous
Can the ledge be done in Anarchy mode?
updates.description: If you can dream, you can achive

updates.title: Man i sure do love walking around ledges
